item.description:
If you don't have any plans for New Years Eve & don't want to spend an other night in front of the TV, you should join us at the The Sheraton Hotel in Framingham.

EVERYTHING IS PAY AS YOU GO, so nobody has to worry about committing to anything. Anybody who is currently undecided can join us at anytime for the party @ Molly Malone's.

$20 is for the entrance into Molly Malone's all night. Molly is an
Irish Pub in the hotel & they will have a DJ. It also includes the
midnight champaign toast. Doors open @ 6 pm & it's on first come basis
for a table. We will try to get there early enough to get a table, but no guarantees

They are also having a Prime rib dinner buffet at J. Weatherspoon
(sp?). The buffet is all you can eat for $29.95 per person.

The hotel is also offering packages that include room/buffet &
entrance into Molly's. I'm not going to stay @ the hotel, but if
people don't want to worry about driving it's seems to be a good deal.


http://specialoffers....
=

(I don't think I copied the address correctly, but if you google
Sheraton FRAMINGHAM you should be able to get to their site. The
packages are under Hotel Offers.)

HAPPY NEW YEAR!!!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be @ Molly Malon's. "Try and find us, Think of if as your last adventure of 2009 or your 1st in the new year.
item.name: New Year's Eve @ The Sheraton Framingham
